{"id":488829997,"lang":"cpp","time":"11 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1620148022,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/488829997/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Non-decreasing Array","memory":"27.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool checkPossibility(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n = nums.size();\n        nums.push_back(INT_MAX);\n        vector<bool> suff(n, true);\n        int prev = INT_MAX;\n        int sr = true;\n        for (int i = n - 1; i >= 0; --i) {\n            if (prev < nums[i]) {\n                suff[i] = false;\n            } else {\n                suff[i] = sr;\n            }\n            prev = nums[i];\n            sr = suff[i];\n        }\n        int pr = true;\n        prev = INT_MIN;\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n            if (prev <= nums[i + 1] && pr && suff[i + 1]) {\n                return true;\n            }\n            pr = pr && nums[i] >= prev;\n            prev = nums[i];\n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"non-decreasing-array"}
